segments.advisor_message: To start off, could you share the name of your dependent?
segments.client_message: Yeah, um, my dependent's name is, uh, Samantha, I think she’s, she’s like, uh, fifteen now. Um, yeah, Samantha Jones.

segments.advisor_message: Great, and when was she born?
segments.client_message: Oh right, right, um, her birthday is, it’s, uh, I wanna say, October 12, 2008, wait, no, um, yeah, that sounds right!
